0.name: Throne of Bones
0.fullDesc: Restores HP by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> of Mydei's Max HP and accumulates {{5}} Talent's Charge point(s). Deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Mydei's Max HP to one designated enemy, and deals Imaginary DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Mydei's Max HP to adjacent targets. Additionally, Taunts the target and targets adjacent to it, lasting for {{4}} turn(s). The next use of "Godslayer Be God" prioritizes attacking one designated enemy, and this effect only works on the latest target.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Restores HP</orangeStrong> and accumulates Talent's Charge. Deals massive Imaginary DMG to one designated enemy and Imaginary DMG to adjacent targets, then <orangeStrong>Taunts</orangeStrong> the target and their adjacent targets.

0.name: Blood for Blood
0.fullDesc:
For each 1% of HP lost, accumulates 1 point of Charge (up to 200 points). When Charge reaches 100, consumes 100 points of Charge to enter the "Vendetta" state, restores HP equal to {{1, percent}}% of Mydei's Max HP, and advances action by 100%. While the "Vendetta" state is active, Max HP increases by {{5, percent}}% of the current Max HP and DEF remains at 0. At the start of this unit's turn, automatically uses "Kingslayer Be King."
When Charge reaches {{3}} points during the "Vendetta" state, Mydei immediately gains 1 extra turn and automatically uses "Godslayer Be God."
When receiving a killing blow during the "Vendetta" state, Mydei will not be knocked down, but will clear his Charge, exits the "Vendetta" state, and restores HP by {{4, percent}}% of his Max HP.
0.shortDesc:
When losing HP, accumulates Charge. When Charge is at 100, enters the "Vendetta" state, restores HP and advances action. During "Vendetta," Max HP increases and DEF remains at 0. At the start of this unit's turn, automatically uses "Kingslayer Be King."
When Charge reaches 150 during "Vendetta," Mydei immediately gains 1 extra turn and automatically uses "Godslayer Be God."
When Mydei receives a killing blow, he exits the "Vendetta" state.

0.name: Cage of Broken Lance

If actively attacking Dazed enemies, when entering battle, deals Imaginary DMG equal to {{2, percent}}% of Mydei's Max HP to all enemies, and Taunts the targets, lasting for {{4}} turn(s). This unit accumulates {{5}} point(s) of Talent's Charge.
0.shortDesc: Pulls in enemies within a certain area and inflicts Daze on them. After attacking Dazed enemies and entering battle, deals minor Imaginary DMG to all enemies and Taunts the targets. This unit accumulates Talent's Charge.
